Title: Title
TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Tangram Activity. Tangram is a famous classical chinese game in which the goal is to rearrange the seven separate pieces into a complete image of various shapes
TutoAboutContent: You can play the game in single player or multi player mode. In Single player mode, you have an option to enable/disable timer while in multi player mode, the timer is always enabled. When timer is disabled, you will have one puzzle or question per game, while when timer is enabled, you will have more than one puzzle or question per game
TutoEachPuzzleContent: In Each Puzzle or question, you will be given a target shape or tangram. Using the 7 pieces ( can only be used once each and should be non-overlapping ) you have to form the target shape
TutoTangramCategoryContent: These are the various categories you choose for the tangrams you want to solve
TutoBoardContent:
This your game board. You have your 7 tans or pieces here and also your target shape.
You can drag and drop the piece to move it.
You can click or tap on the piece to rotate it.
TutoKeyBoardContent:
You can control tans using keyboard also.
Select or Deselct Tans
Move Tans
Rotate Tans
TutoRefreshContent: Click to Refresh the game tans position and move them back to their initial positions
TutoPassContent: If you are unable to solve the puzzle you can pass the current puzzle and move to another one
TutoSettingViewContent: You can Edit / Delete the particular tangram puzzle or category from the list. You can also create new tangram Puzzle or category and add the same to your puzzle set
TutoScoreContent:
If you solve the puzzle, you will get the calculated score. You should try to maximize the score. It will depend upon:
A. Points on Solving Puzzle
B. Time Taken
If you solve the puzzle under 1 min, You will get bonus (depending upon time taken to solve the puzzle).So the quicker the you solve the puzzle, the higher the score will be.
C. Tangram Puzzle Difficulty
Tangrams puzzles can be easy or hard depending upon the number of outer outlines points of the tangram
D. Game Difficulty
Game Difficulty can Be Easy or Medium i.e filled or unfilled target puzzle
E. Number of Hints Used
Less hints taken gives more Score
score = A+max(0,15-B/4)+C+D-E
TutoHintContent: Click this to get a hint from the computer. WARNING!! There will be a penalty on using hint. If you use hints for all six or seven tans then you will get 0 score
TutoLevelContent: Choose the Difficulty level. There are two Levels:- Easy where All the outlines and inner outlines of all the tans would be visible and Medium where only silhouette of the target tangram would be visible
TutoTimerContent: Choose Timer. You can disable/enable the timer here
TutoGameActionsContent: Here you have Game Actions buttons like "Restart", "Pass", "Refresh". "Refresh" will move back all of  your tans to initial positions
TutoViewContent: Click To Change The view i.e. Play/Setting view
TutoRandomPlayContent: Click To Play With Random Tangrams
TutoValidPuzzleIndicatorContent: This will indicate if the puzzle you created is valid or invalid
TutoResultContent: On this screen you can see Solutions of the puzzles you have attempted in Timer Mode
TutoTangramCardContent: Each Card will show you the info about the puzzle you have encountered in the game.If You have solved the puzzle then you will see your solution of the puzzle otherwise you will see computer's solution
TutoClockInfoContent: This will show the time taken to solve the particular puzzle
TutoScoreInfoContent: This will show the score you got in the particular puzzle
TutoRestartContent: Click here to restart the game
TutoPaginationContent: This will show the puzzle number you are at and the total puzzles you have attempted. You can move to next/previous puzzles by the controls given
TutoLeaderboardPaginationContent: This will show the page number of the leaderboard rankings you are at. You can move to next/previous rankings by the controls given
TutoLeaderboardMainContent: Here you can see the rankings and score of the users competiting with you
TutoPlayViewContent: You can click on any puzzle to solve the same
TutoNewCategoryContent: Click here to Create New Category
TutoBoardEditorContent: This is the Editor board where you can arrange the pieces together to form a Valid tangram
TutoValidPuzzleContent:
For a puzzle to be a valid puzzle:
1) No any two tans or pieces should be overlapped to each other.
2) Every tan should be connected or joined to atleast one other tan
3) The width and height of the tangram created should not be more than the width and height of the square box present on the board
4) Tangram Name should not be empty
TutoCategoryNameContent: Enter the name of your new category
TutoNewPuzzleContent: Click here to create new tangram puzzle
TutoEditPuzzleContent: Click here to edit the particular puzzle
TutoDeletePuzzleContent: Click here to delete the particular puzzle
TutoEditCategoryContent: Click here to Edit current Category
TutoDeleteCategoryContent: Click here to Delete the current category and all of its puzzles
